Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Jardin Tropical Hotel in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be minutes from Puerto Colon and Torviscas Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Aqualand Costa Adeje and Bobo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 390 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Adeje? This hotel has 6889 square feet (640 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puerto Colon - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Torviscas Beach - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Bobo Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Siam Park - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Troya Beach - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Veronicas Strip - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

Las Vistas Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Golf Costa Adeje - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi

The preferred airport for Jardin Tropical Hotel is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
